name: Angela Crabtree, MS
subtitle: Building AI tools for accelerating biological discovery
description: I'm developing AI-driven tools and workflows for biological research and offering consulting for labs looking to modernize their computational capabilities.
education: With a background as a bench scientist turned bioinformatician, I understand the challenges of bridging experimental work and computational analysis.
beliefAndGoal: At BioDataWorks, I help biological researchers streamline their work by building custom AI-powered tools. Whether it’s finding relevant literature, searching past experimental data, or automating repetitive analysis steps, I design accessible solutions that make research faster, smarter, and more enjoyable.
